mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Russell, William, 1798-1873
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Forwards him no. 1 of journal on education; any publication concerning Virginia University would be acceptable in return; thanks him for favorable attention to former letter on preparatory schools addressed to him from New Haven [Conn.] while teaching there [Apr. 18, 1824].
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1826 February 6, Boston, [Massachusetts] to Thomas Jefferson, Rector, Virginia University, n.p.
